001package com.technototes.library.hardware.motor;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
004
005import com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDeviceGroup;
006
007/** Class for a group of motors
008 *
009 * @param <T> The type of motors to group
010 */
011@SuppressWarnings("unused")
012public class MotorGroup<T extends DcMotorSimple> extends Motor<T> implements HardwareDeviceGroup<Motor<T>> {
013    private final Motor[] followers;
014
015    /** Make a motor group
016     *
017     * @param motors The motors
018     */
019    @SafeVarargs
020    public MotorGroup(Motor<T>... motors) {
021        super(motors[0].getDevice());
022        followers = new Motor[motors.length - 1];
023        System.arraycopy(motors, 1, followers, 0, followers.length);
024    }
025
026    @Override
027    public Motor<T>[] getFollowers() {
028        return followers;
029    }
030
031    @Override
032    public Motor<T>[] getAllDevices() {
033        Motor<T>[] m = new Motor[followers.length + 1];
034        m[0] = this;
035        System.arraycopy(followers, 0, m, 1, m.length - 1);
036        return m;
037    }
038
039    @Override
040    public void propogate(double value) {
041        for (Motor m : followers) {
042            m.setSpeed(value);
043        }
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public void setSpeed(double speed) {
048        super.setSpeed(speed);
049        propogate(speed);
050    }
051}
